caption.center: MARVIN N. CARR, Respondent, v. GLADYS K. TARNAVSKY, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Three.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Benton County, No. 94-2-00273-0, Craig Matheson, J., entered October 26, 1994.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Munson, J., concurred in by Sweeney, C.J., and Kurtz, J.
